revision.text:
{{Infobox Key Item |name = Town Map |image = [[File:TownMap_HighRes.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Town Map''. |use = Allows access to the Town Map |obtain = Unlock [[Kanto]] Route 2 }} ===Description=== A very convenient map that can be viewed anytime. It even shows you your present location in the region. ===Acquisition=== Defeat 10 Pok√©mon on Route 1. When this is complete, the Town map will be given by Professor Oak. ===Effects=== You will now be able to navigate using the Town map displayed in the interface.


{{Key Items}}
[[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]
